actions.text: Amendment SA 4375 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 4375 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Specter. (consideration: CR S2083-2084; text: CR S2084) To express the Sense of the Senate regarding Philadelphia Housing Authority's "Moving to Work Agreement" with the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4375 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4375 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Specter.

purpose: To express the Sense of the Senate regarding Philadelphia Housing Authority's "Moving to Work Agreement" with the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development.
